## PackageResource.create() method

Creates a package (transaction).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
create(payload: Requests.CreatePackageData): Promise<Responses.CreatePackage>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payload | Requests.[CreatePackageData](./onespan-sign-node.createpackagedata.md) | Package initial information |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Responses.CreatePackage&gt;

A payload that contains the ID of the newly created package.
